categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Shattered Moon was a moniker given to the lone moon of the planet Tenupe. Red-hued, the moon had broken up into over fifty large fragments at a juncture in its history. During the Swarm War of 36 ABY, a Killik fleet secreted itself in the ruins of the moon in preparation to ambush Chiss forces during the Battle of Tenupe.
